SpellDef.Description: All enemies are stunned for 3 actions unless they resist.
Take control of the targeted Beast unless it resists.
Take control of the targeted Beast unless it resists.
Take control of the targeted Twisted unit.
Convert a trained unit to your cause unless they resist.
Take control of enemy unit unless they resist.
Target adjacent enemy loses their next action, unless they resist.
Launch a normal Attack and knock the victim back 1 tile.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Launch a %d Attack and knock the victim back 1 tile.

SpellDef.Description: Allied units gain +15 to Dodge (+5 per air shard) vs ranged attacks.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Allied units gain +%d to Dodge vs ranged attacks.

SpellDef.Description: Transfers 12 hit points (+2 per death shard) from enemy unit to the caster.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Transfers %d hit points from enemy unit to the caster. That damage is halved if the enemy resists.

SpellDef.Description: Heals target unit by 16 (+2 per life shard).
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Heals target unit by %d.

SpellDef.Description: 3 adjacent enemies are blasted with a lightning charge, taking 8 (+2 per level) in lightning damage.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: 3 adjacent enemies are blasted with a lightning charge, taking %d lightning damage.

SpellDef.Description: Summon a wave that does 8 damage (+2 per water shard) to 3 adjacent enemies.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Summon a wave that does %d damage to 3 adjacent enemies.

SpellDef.Description: Does 10 (+2 per Level) Lightning damage to all units in a line 5 tiles long.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Does %d Lightning damage to all units in a line 5 tiles long.

SpellDef.Description: All enemy units suffer -3 to Initiative (-1 per water shard) unless they resist.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: All enemy units suffer -%d to Initiative unless they resist.

SpellDef.Description: Target enemy unit suffers -3 to Initiative (-1 per water shard) unless they resist.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Target enemy unit suffers -%d to Initiative unless they resist.

SpellDef.Description: Does a random effect to target enemy unit unless they resist.
Target unit is +3 to Initiative (+1 per air shard).
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Target unit is +%d to Initiative.

SpellDef.Description: Attack up to 3 adjacent enemies.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Launch an %d Attack at 3 adjacent enemys.

SpellDef.Description: A spear of light strikes the victim doing double the caster's level damage and reducing their Attack by 2.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: A spear of light strikes the victim doing %d damage and reducing their Attack by 2.

SpellDef.Description: Flames engulf all enemies within 1 tile of the caster, striking for 16 + the caster's level in fire damage.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Flames engulf all enemies within 1 tile of the caster, striking for %d fire damage.

SpellDef.Description: Target unit is enveloped in fire taking the 5 + triple the caster's level in fire damage.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Target unit is enveloped in fire taking %d fire damage.

SpellDef.Description: 25% of the damage done to the target is reflected back on his attacker.
Target unit loses 25% of his Hit Points and Defense unless they resist.
The victim's Attack is lowered by 25% and the caster's Attack is increased by 25% unless the victim resists.
Transfers 1 hit point per caster level from enemy unit to the caster unless resisted.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Transfers %d hit points from enemy unit to the caster unless resisted.

SpellDef.Description: Does 1 (+1 per level) lightning damage to the victim. This damage is multipled by the amount of units casting.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Does %d lightning damage to the victim.

SpellDef.Description: Teleport to a location and take 1 further action.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Teleport to a location and take 1 further action immediately.

SpellDef.Description: Summons a bear or great wolf.
A ray of darkness strikes the victim doing double the caster's level damage and reducing their Dodge by 5.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: A ray of darkness strikes the victim doing %d damage and and reducing their Dodge by 5.

SpellDef.Description: Does 2 (+1 per level) lightning damage to the victim. This damage is multipled by the amount of units casting.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Does %d lightning damage to the victim.

SpellDef.Description: An arcane blast strikes the victim doing 6 + caster's level lightning damage and reducing their Resistance to Fire, Water, Lightning and Poison by 5 (+1 per level).
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: An arcane blast strikes the victim doing %d lightning damage and reducing their Resistance to Fire, Water, Lightning and Poison by 5 (+1 per level).

SpellDef.Description: An arcane arrow strikes the victim doing 9 + caster's level damage.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: An arcane arrow strikes the victim doing %d damage.

SpellDef.Description: A spear of light strikes the victim doing double the caster's level damage and reducing their Attack by 2.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: A spear of light strikes the victim doing %d damage and reducing their Attack by 2.

SpellDef.Description: A blast of cold strikes the victim doing 7 + caster's level damage and reducing their Initiative by 2.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: A blast of cold strikes the victim doing %d damage and reducing their Initiative by 2.

SpellDef.Description: Charge through an adjacent enemy unit, dealing damage equal to your attack and knocking the target prone.
Divine Inferno does 8 (+2 per level) fire damage per level of the caster to units within a 1 tile radius. Demons and Undead suffer double damage.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Divine Inferno does %d fire damage to units within a 1 tile radius. Demons and Undead suffer double damage.

SpellDef.Description: Unit strikes the target with an attack that deals 50% of the attacker's normal damage, then immediately takes another action.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Unit strikes the target with an attack that deals %d damage, then immediately takes another action.

SpellDef.Description: Move to an adjacent unoccupied square and take 1 further action immediately. Grants +10 Dodge for 1 turn.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Move to an adjacent unoccupied square and take 1 further action immediately. Grants +10 Dodge for 1 turn.

SpellDef.Description: Move to an adjacent unoccupied square, unit receives +40 dodge bonus until next turn
Halves Attack of all enemy units for 3 turns unless they resist.
Friendly units within 1 tile of the caster are immune to physical damage for 3 turns.
Unit makes an attack against a random enemy before combat begins.
Throw bolas at a nearby enemy.
Units within 1 tile radius of the target tile are +25 Dodge, -25 Accuracy for 3 turns
Throw a net trap at a nearby enemy.
+2 Initiative when using a Bow.
Bonus Initiative when using a ranged Staff.
Archer only. Skip turn, but +25% Accuracy, +25% chance to Critical, +25% Critical Hit damage subsequent turn
Normal damage and target is -1 Moves for 3 turns.
Normal damage and target is -25% Accuracy.
Normal damage and target is -25% Attack.
Attack that does normal damage and reduces target's Attack by 25%.
Attack an enemy with a bonus equal to 25% of the target unit's Attack.
Attack an enemy with a bonus %d Attack.
Brings forth a wave of flame that causes 8 (+2 per level) fire damage to all enemy units.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Brings forth a wave of flame that causes %d fire damage to all enemy units.

SpellDef.Description: The victim's Attack is lowered by 25% and the caster's Attack is increased by 25% unless the victim resists.
Brimstone Firestorm does 1 fire damage and 1 infernal damage per level of the caster to units within a 1 tile radius.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Brimstone Firestorm does 1 fire damage and 1 infernal damage to units within a 1 tile radius.

SpellDef.Description: Target loses 15% (+1 per caster level) Accuracy and Spell Mastery.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Target loses %d Accuracy and Spell Mastery.

SpellDef.Description: A fiery dart strikes units within a 1 tile radius doing 7 + caster's level fire damage, plus a further 2 fire damage per round for the next 2 rounds.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: A fiery dart strikes units within a 1 tile radius doing %d fire damage, plus a further 2 fire damage per round for the next 2 rounds.

SpellDef.Description: Wreaths the target in flames, doing 6 fire damage to anyone who attacks him.
3 adjacent enemies are blasted with heat, taking 8 (+2 per fire shard) in fire damage.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: 3 adjacent enemies are blasted with heat, taking %d fire damage.

SpellDef.Description: Enemies in a 1 tile radius are engulfed in a cloud of ash, reducing their Accuracy by 25% for 5 turns, unless they resist.
A bolt of doom strikes the victim doing double the caster's level damage and reducing their Attack and Initiative by 1.
All enemies suffer a -25% to Accuracy and Dodge for 3 turns, unless they resist.
Unit's defense is reduced by 50% for 5 turns.
Transfers 4 hit points (+1 per caster level) from all enemies to the caster. Damage is halved if the enemy resists.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Transfers %d hit points per level from all enemies to the caster. Damage is halved if the enemy resists.

SpellDef.Description: Target suffers -1 Move and -50% Accuracy for 3 turns, unless resisted.
Target unit suffers the caster's attack strength in infernal damage.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Target unit suffers %d infernal damage.

SpellDef.Description: Attack that has a 50% chance to do double damage and a 50% chance to miss.
A ray of darkness strikes the victim doing double the caster's level damage and reducing their Dodge by 5.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: A ray of darkness strikes the victim doing %d damage and and reducing their Dodge by 5.

SpellDef.Description: Take control of the targeted Beast unless it resists.
Target unit gains +25% resistance to physical damage and +1 counterattack.
Transfers 3 hit points (multiplied by the amount of units casting) from enemy unit to the casting unit. Can be resisted.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Transfers %d hitpoints from enemy unit to the casting unit. Can be resisted.

SpellDef.Description: Inflicts 4 infernal damage multiplied by the number of casting units. If the unit is killed a Skeleton is raised in their place. Can be resisted.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Inflicts %d infernal damage. If the unit is killed a Skeleton is raised in their place. Can be resisted.

SpellDef.Description: All friendly units are given the Bleed I & II abilities for the duration of the battle

GameModifier.Provides: Allows the unit to use the Bleed special ability
Bleed attack does 6 damage per action instead of 3

SpellDef.Description: Attack a unit from a distance with an infernal blast.
A short range attack that covers targeted enemies with a toxic mist, stunning and poisoning them unless resisted.
Caster is immune to physical damage for 3 turns.
Summons a Wind Warg (level equal to the caster) in tactical combat.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Summon a level %d Wind Warg.

SpellDef.Description: Summons a Sand Golem (level equal to the caster) in tactical combat.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Summon a level %d Sand Golem.

SpellDef.Description: Summons an Ignys(level equal to the caster) in tactical combat.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Summon a level %d Ignys.

SpellDef.Description: Summons a River Naja (level equal to the caster) in tactical combat.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Summon a level %d River Naja.

SpellDef.Description: Summons a Celestial Defender (level equal to the caster) in tactical combat.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Summon a level %d Celestial Defender.

SpellDef.Description: Summons a Cindercorpse (level equal to the caster) in tactical combat.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Summon a level %d Cindercorpse.

SpellDef.Description: Summons a Storm Pack Drake (level equal to the caster) in tactical combat.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Summon a level %d Storm Pack Drake.

SpellDef.Description: Summons a Crag Shrill (level equal to the caster) in tactical combat.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Summon a level %d Crag Shrill.

SpellDef.Description: Summons a Inferno Spider (level equal to the caster) in tactical combat.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Summon a level %d Inferno Spider.

SpellDef.Description: Summons a Sea Skath (level equal to the caster) in tactical combat.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Summon a level %d Sea Skath.

SpellDef.Description: Summons a Cyxel (level equal to the caster) in tactical combat.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Summon a level %d Cyxel.

SpellDef.Description: Summons a Corpse Spider (level equal to the caster) in tactical combat.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Summon a level %d Corpse Spider.

SpellDef.Description: Summons a random sized unit of Water Shrills (level equal to the caster) in tactical combat.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Summons a random sized unit of Water Shrills (level %d).

SpellDef.Description: Summons a Storm Wolf Party (level equal to the caster) in tactical combat.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Summons a level %d Storm Wolf Party.

SpellDef.Description: Summons a Lightbringer at the same level as the caster.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Summons a level %d Lightbringer.

SpellDef.Description: Summons a random sized unit of Shadow Demons (level equal to the caster) in tactical combat.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Summons a random sized unit of Shadow Demons (level %d).
